DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE . To evaluate impact self-acting eyetracking retest software reproducibility retinal nerve fiber layer ( RNFL ) thickness measurement glaucoma patient healthy control subject use Spectralis® SD-OCT. METHODS . RNFL thickness measure 56 normal 47 glaucomatous eye one operator within one session brief rest measurement . Three measurement take eye-tracker retest function , three take without function , alternate measurement method . - Trial medical device
DOC.brief_title: Reproducibility Retinal Nerve Fiber Layer Thickness Measurements Using Eye Tracker Retest Function Spectralis® SD-OCT Glaucomatous Eyes Healthy Controls
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Visual acuity equal 0.5 Snellen , refractive error less ±5.00 diopter ( D ) spheric ±3.00 D cylindrical history ocular trauma severe ocular disease ( particularly diseases affect optic nerve surgery uncomplicated cataract surgery ) . Additional inclusion criterion glaucoma group diagnosis primary open angle glaucoma ( POAG ) PEXglaucoma . Exclusion criterion : Exclusion criterion control group history glaucoma intraocular pressure beyond 21 mmHg optic disc cup 0.6
